devServices.name: postgres
devServices.description: Relational database with support JSON and time series support. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: mongodb
devServices.description: NoSQL DB. The code is 'source available' aka 'look but don't touch'. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: minio
devServices.description: S3 alternative aka Object Storage. Compatible with the AWS S3 API. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: mariadb
devServices.description: Popular mySQL open source fork. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: redis
devServices.description: Backend key value store. Used mostly for caching requests. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: bitwarden
devServices.description: Secrets manager. Optionally, you can have sway auto generate strong secrets and populate bitwarden upon setup. Supports yubikey. There are two instances of Bitwarden. One to manage your dev secrets and one one to manage your personal secrets. We use the rust based version for both

devServices.name: emqx
devServices.description: IoT MQTT Broker. AWS IoT alternative. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: hasura
devServices.description: GraphQL backend as a service. Alternative to AWS AppSync. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: kafka
devServices.description: Stream processing. AWS Kinesis alternative. Comes with schema registry and a grafana dashboard. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: keycloak
devServices.description: Identity Managements. Alternative to AWS Cognito. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: kong
devServices.description: API Gateway. Supports Keycloak Auth. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: garie
devServices.description: Measure web page performance using a grafana dashboard. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: gitlab
devServices.description: Version control and CI. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: sentry
devServices.description: Error monitoring. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: loki
devServices.description: Logging framework built for grafana. Alternative to AWS Cloudwatch. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: postal
devServices.description: Mail server for apps. Alternative to AWS SES. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: gorush
devServices.description: Push notification service for iOS and android. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: textbelt
devServices.description: API for outgoing SMS. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: traefik
devServices.description: Container routing and cert management. Part of sway dev services.

devServices.name: matrix
devServices.description: Team communication. Slack alternative. Web Client available at element.io. Compatible with weechat. Part of sway dev services.

personalServices.name: jellyfin
personalServices.description: Multimedia suite designed to organize, manage, and share digital media files to networked devices. There are two instances of Jellyfin. A public one and a local one. The local one is for local clients and dlna casting. Part of sway personal services.

personalServices.name: bitcore
personalServices.description: Crypto currency manager. Can host wallets of the most popular currencies. Compatible with bitpay debit card and bitpay for android. Part of sway personal services.

personalServices.name: collabora
personalServices.description: Libre Office nextcloud app and android client. Uses syncthing to sync files. Uses nextcloud as a web frontend. Part of sway personal services.

personalServices.name: bitpay
personalServices.description: Formerly copay. Bitcore android client for managing cryptocurrencies. Part of sway personal services.

personalServices.name: forecastie
personalServices.description: Weather app. Part of sway personal services.

personalServices.name: home-assistant
personalServices.description: Home automation suite. Part of sway personal services.

personalServices.name: joplin
personalServices.description: Markdown first note manager. Can use any external editor. Syncs with Nextcloud. Part of sway personal services.

personalServices.name: calibre-web
personalServices.description: Web Client for ebooks. Part of sway personal services.

personalServices.name: mastodon
personalServices.description: Twitter with better privacy. Part of sway personal services.

personalServices.name: mycroft
personalServices.description: AI platform/Smart Assistant. Part of sway personal services.

personalServices.name: paperless
personalServices.description: Document management. Part of sway personal services.

personalServices.name: nextcloud
personalServices.description: Groupware service. It connects orgzly, joplin, simple-contacts, simple-calendar via nextcloud's DAV servers. Part of sway personal services.

personalServices.name: photoprism
personalServices.description: Photo management with deep learning. Uses syncthing to sync with clients. Part of sway personal services.

personalServices.name: syncthing
personalServices.description: Used to sync files between personal services and clients. Linux based clients use a local web server that runs as a daemon service. While android based clients, uses the app. Part of sway personal services.

personalServices.name: weechat
personalServices.description: Centralizes all chat application. IRC, matrix, discord, and telegram. Part of sway personal services.

personalServices.name: funkwhale
personalServices.description: Music Server inspired by grooveshark. Users can easily share their library with others. Part of sway personal services.

personalServices.name: hydroxide
personalServices.description: Third party Protonmail bridge. Exposes your protonmail account data as smtp, imap and cardDAV servers. Part of sway personal services.

personalServices.name: selfoss
personalServices.description: RSS reader. Part of sway personal services.

androidClients.name: microg
androidClients.description: Android client that reimplements google's proprietary services. Signature spoofing must be enabled.

androidClients.name: antennapod
androidClients.description: Android podcast client. Uses Syncthing to sync a podcasts.xml file, which lists all your podcasts feeds.

androidClients.name: weechat-android
androidClients.description: Third party android client for weechat.

androidClients.name: glasnost
androidClients.description: Third party android client for gitlab. Supports multiple hosts, fingerprint auth,  repo browsing and merge requests.

androidClients.name: k9-mail
androidClients.description: An android email client with a neomutt lineage.

androidClients.name: librera
androidClients.description: An android ebook client.  Syncing is done via syncthing.  Syncs with main calibre-web ebook directory.

androidClients.name: orgzly
androidClients.description: An android org-mode client. Syncing is done via nextcloud.

androidClients.name: simple-calendar
androidClients.description: An android contacts client. Syncing is done via dav5x on the android side and nextcloud on the server sie.

androidClients.name: simple-contacts
androidClients.description: An android contacts client. Syncing is done via dav5x on the android side and nextcloud on the server sie.

androidClients.name: simple-gallery
androidClients.description: An android photo client. Syncing is done via syncthing. Syncs with main photoprism photo directory.

androidClients.name: termux
androidClients.description: An android terminal. Similar to Debian, but Arch linux can also be installed.

androidClients.name: voice
androidClients.description: An android audiobook client.  Syncing is done via syncthing.  Syncs with main audiobook directory.

terminalClients.name: ncmpcpp
terminalClients.description: Audio Terminal Client. Uses mopidy to connect funkwhale. Part of sway workstation.

terminalClients.name: cava
terminalClients.description: Audio visualizer for the terminal. Part of sway workstation.

terminalClients.name: epr
terminalClients.description: Epub and pdf reader for the terminal. Can render code with correct formatting and searchable via grep. Part of sway workstation.

terminalClients.name: newsboat
terminalClients.description: Terminal RSS Reader. Relies on server based feeds.xml file. Part of sway workstation.

terminalClients.name: castero
terminalClients.description: Ncurses style podcast player. Relies on server based podcasts.xml file. Part of sway workstation.

terminalClients.name: ranger
terminalClients.description: Terminal based file explorer. Uses feh for image previews. Part of sway workstation.

terminalClients.name: feh
terminalClients.description: Minimalist image rendering cli. Part of sway workstation.

terminalClients.name: mpv
terminalClients.description: Video player cli. Part of sway workstation

terminalClients.name: emacs
terminalClients.description: Sway uses Doom emacs. Maintained configurations you can start with.

terminalClients.name: neomutt
terminalClients.description: Terminal based email client. Uses a modified version of Luke Smith's mutt-wizard.

publicWebClients.name: glowing-bear
publicWebClients.description: Third party web client for weechat.

operatingSystems.name: debian
operatingSystems.description: OS for servers, cast and speaker.

operatingSystems.name: lineageos
operatingSystems.description: OS for the TV and mobile.
